card.name: Deadpool
card.property: The Regeneratin' Degenerate — Forced Interrupt: When you would be defeated, instead set your hit point dial to 1, change to alter-ego form, and add 1 acceleration token to the main scheme.

alternate.name: Wade Wilson
alternate.property: Break the Fourth Wall — Action: Discard a card from your hand → search your deck for a Deadpool event and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)
"Sometimes I'm a mutant, sometimes I'm not. Depends on who you ask."

card.name: Cable
card.property: [star] Cable gets +1 THW and +1 ATK for each acceleration token on the main scheme (to a maximum of +3 THW and +3 ATK.)
"Wade, you are my best bud!"

card.name: Exhausting Personality
card.property: Hero Action: Choose: • Place 1 acceleration token on the main scheme → stun and confuse the villain. • Exhaust a player's identity → that player draws 1 card for each acceleration token on the main scheme.

card.name: Maximum Effort
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Take any amount of damage up to your remaining hit points → deal an equal amount of damage to an enemy.
"This is gonna hurt me as much as it hurts you." — Deadpool

card.name: Metaknowledge
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When an encounter card is revealed, cancel all of its effects and discard it. Take 1 damage for each icon ([star] and [boost]) in that card's boost area.
"It says here I defeat you with a wedgie." — Deadpool

card.name: "Yoo-Hoo!"
card.property: Hero Action (thwart): Take any amount of damage up to your remaining hit points → remove an equal amount of threat from a scheme.
"You boys mind me dropping in?" — Deadpool

card.name: Montage
card.property: This card generates 1 additional [wild] resource for each acceleration token on the main scheme (to a maximum of 3 additional resources).

card.name: Chimichanga Truck
card.property: Response: After an identity makes a basic recovery, exhaust Chimichanga Truck → ready that identity.
"Did someone say, 'Chimichanga'? Nevermind. That was just the sound of my skull and braine healing." — Deadpool

card.name: Armed to the Teeth
card.property: Response: After you play Armed to the Teeth, search your collection for 1 [[WEAPON]] upgrade from any aspect and attach it facedown here. Action: Exhaust Armed to the Teeth → swap the card attached here with a [[WEAPON]] upgrade you control.

card.name: Deadpool's Katana
card.property: Restriced. Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Deadpool's Katana and take 1 damage → deal 2 damage to an enemy. This attack gains piercing.

card.name: It Ain't Over...
card.property: Attach to the main scheme. Increase the target threat value of attached scheme by 2 for each acceleration token on it.
"I've got you right where I want you." — Deadpool

card.name: This Card is Fire
card.property: Forced Response: After your turn ends, if this card is in your hand, take 1 damage. Hero Action (attack): Deal X damage to an enemy. X is the amount of damage you have sustained.

card.name: Dogpool
card.property: Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Defeated: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Headpool
card.property: [star] Response: After Headpool attacks and damages a minion, that minion attacks another enemy of your choice.

card.name: Kidpool
card.property: [star] Kidpool's attacks gain piercing.
"Congratulations on having me in your deck."

card.name: Lady Deadpool
card.property: When Defeated: Defeat a non-[[ELITE]] minion.

card.name: Barely a Scratch
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent 1 of that damage for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play.

card.name: Cutupper
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Stun that enemy.
SQUEAK!

card.name: Da Bomb
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Deal 10 damage to the villain. Deal 1 damage to each enemy and hero for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play.

card.name: Get Rage-y
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Action: Ready an ally. That ally gets +1 ATK until the end of the phase.
"You call that a pull-up?" — Sergeant Deadpool

card.name: "I Got This"
card.property: Hero Action: If the following icons are on 1 or more cards in play: [crisis] — Deal 3 damage to an enemy. [acceleration] — Remove 2 threat from a scheme. [amplify] — Ready an ally you control. [hazard] — Draw 1 card.

card.name: Not my Responsibility
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on a scheme, you or your ally takes it as damage instead.

card.name: 'Pool Inspection
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Hero Action (thwart): Remove 5 threat from the main scheme, ignoring the crisis icon ([crisis]). Remove 1 threat from each scheme for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play.
"This pool is a disaster!" — Deadpool

card.name: Live Dangerously
card.property: Victory 0. Each identity gets +2 hand size.
"♫ Nothing can cause me pain! Not even an oncoming tr...♪" — Deadpool

card.name: Self Confidence
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates if your identity has sustained less than 5 damage (triple the resources instead if you have sustained no damage).

card.name: Self Control
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates if your identity has sustained less than 5 damage (triple the resources instead if you have sustained no damage).

card.name: Self Preservation
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Double the number of resources this card generates if your identity has sustained less than 5 damage (triple the resources instead if you have sustained no damage).

card.name: Git Gud
card.property: Reduce the cost to play Git Gud by 2 if you did not win your previous game of Marvel Champions. Forced Interrupt: When a player would be defeated, they set their hit point dial to 1 and change to alter-ego form instead. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: Healing Factor
card.property: Max 1 per player. Response: After the player phase begins, exhaust Healing Factor → heal 2 damage from your identity.
"Now I'm the best at whatever it is Wolverine does." — Deadpool

card.name: Stick-To-Itiveness
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Hero Action: Spend a [physical] resource and exhaust this card → ready your hero.
"Acquiesce? I don't know the meaning of the word." — Deadpool

card.name: Bob, Agent of Hydra
card.property: Response: After Bob, Agent of Hydra enters play, deal 2 damage to an enemy or remove 1 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Negasonic Teenage Warhead
card.property: Interrupt: When a treachery is revealed, deal 2 damage to Negasonic Teenage Warhead → cancel that treachery's "When Revealed" effects.

card.name: Pandapool
card.property: Toughness.
What's black and white and red all over?

card.name: Break Time
card.property: Alliance. Max 1 per deck. Alter-Ego Action: Take a group break. Leave the table. Read a comic book. When you come back to the game, heal 1 damage from each identity for every minute you were away from the game.

card.name: Get in Front of Me!
card.property: Max 1 per deck. Hero Interrupt: When a treachery card is revealed from the encounter deck, cancel its "When Revealed" effects. The villain attacks you instead. If an ally or another hero defends this attack, draw 1 card.

card.name: Mulligan
card.property: You cannot play this card if you have played another card this phase. Action: Discard your hand. Draw a new hand. (Draw up to your hand size.)
"This hand could be so much better!" — Deadpool

card.name: Deadpool Corps Ship
card.property: Action: Exhaust Deadpool Corps Ship and deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card → put a 'Pool ally into play from your hand.
This spaceship serves as the Deadpool Corps' mobile base of operations.

card.name: Plot Convenience
card.property: Action: Exhaust Plot Convenience → choose: • Attach 1 aspect card from your hand facedown here (to a maximum of 3). • Add 1 card attached facedown here to your hand. Any player may trigger this ability.

card.name: Ambush
card.property: Attach to a side scheme. Max 1 per side scheme. Interrupt: When attached side scheme is defeated, discard a non-[[ELITE]] minion.

card.name: Bazooka
card.property: Restricted. Max 2 per deck. Hero Action (attack): Discard Bazooka → deal 1 damage to an enemy for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play. This attack gains ranged.

card.name: Blackout
card.property: Hero Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → move 1 threat from a scheme to an empty space above that matches the spent resource. If all spaces above are filled, discard this card and confuse the villain.

card.name: Distraction
card.property: Attach to a non-[[ELITE]] minion. Max 1 per minion. Attached minion cannot activate.

card.name: Laser Swords
card.property: Counts as 2 restricted cards. Max 1 per deck. Your hero gets +1 ATK for each [crisis], [acceleration], [amplify], and [hazard] in play (to a maximum of +4 ATK).
"Fwoom, Ksh! Fwoom, Kssssh!" — Kidpool

card.name: Rock, Paper, Scissors
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust this card, choose 1 card in your hand, and discard the top card of your deck → using the diagram above, if a printed resource on the chosen card beats (points to) a printed resource on the discarded card, add the discarded card to your hand.

card.name: Tic-Tac-Toe
card.property: Hero Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → move 1 damage from a character to an empty space above matching the spent resource. If there are 3 damage tokens in a line, deal all damage on this card to an enemy and discard this card.

card.name: War
card.property: Hero Action: Exhaust War → discard the top card of the encounter deck. Take 1 damage for each icon ([star] and [boost]) in the boost area of that card. Discard the top card of your deck. Deal damage to an enemy equal to that card's cost.

card.name: The Merc with the Mouth
card.property: Give to the Wade Wilson player. Exhaust each ally you control. Allies you control cannot ready. Other players cannot resolve player card abilities during your turn. Forced Response: After the player phase ends, if you have not talked this phase, discard this card.
"Was it something I said!" — Deadpool

card.name: Butler
card.property: Forced Interrupt: When Butler schemes, place that threat on Involuntary Procedures, if able. (Deadpool's nemesis minion.) You are confused

card.name: Involuntary Procedures
card.property: Forced Response: After Deadpool takes any amount of damage, place 1 threat here. Then, if there is 10 or more threat here, remove this card from the game.
Butler seeks to cure his sister's cancer using Deadpool's regenerative abilities.

card.name: Tabula Rasa 16
card.property: Attach to your identity. Treat your identity's printed text box as blank (except for [[TRAITS]]). Alter-Ego Action: Spend [mental][mental] resources → discard this card. Attach Tabula Rasa 16 to your identity.
Butler used this drug to erase Deadpool's memory of Butler's medical experiments.

card.name: Mutated Soldier
card.property: Toughness. [star] Forced Response: After Mutated Soldier activates, heal all damage from it.
Butler funded his research by developing super soldiers for foreign governments.

card.name: Crisis of Infinite Deadpools
card.property: When Revealed: Reveal the set-aside Dreadpool minion and Dreadful Deeds side scheme. Shuffle the rest of the set-aside Dreadpool encounter set into the encounter deck. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: Dreadpool
card.property: Dreadpool engages the first player. When Defeated: Deal Dreadpool to the player who defeated him as a facedown encounter card.
"What I do...I do for the cause. But I still feel bad about it...usually."

card.name: Dreadful Deeds
card.property: When Revealed: Place 2 threat here for each player who controls 1 or more 'Pool (pink) cards.
Dreadpool believes the only way to end his suffering is to kill every being in all of the multiverse.

card.name: Anti-Regeneration Ray
card.property: Attach to Dreadpool. Otherwise, attach to the villain. Forced Interrupt: When attached character attacks a non-villain character, threat the attacked character's text box as if it were blank (except for [[TRAITS]]) until the end of the attack. Hero Action: Spend [energy][mental][physical] resources → attach this card to your identity.

card.name: 'Pool-ized
card.property: Treat attached ally as a [['POOL]] minion with a blank text box. Attached minion's SCH is equal to its printed THW and it does not take consequential damage. When Revealed: Attach to the ally with the highest cost without 'Pool-ized attached. Otherwise, this card gains surge.

card.name: Metacidal Tendencies
card.property: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each [[DEADPOOL CORPS]] character (3 damage instead if Dreadpool is in play). If no damage was dealt this way, place 1 acceleration token on the main scheme.
